channel.title: rune on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in rune on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Runes Tarot say do not buy the car!
item.description: 12 December 1997 Today I looked at a used Toyota Camry for purchase. After talking to the guy, my gut reaction said, “yes,” although the two front CV joints needed replacing. He said he’d do it for me and keep the price under $5000 including TT&L. Fine. As I walked back to my car to get my planner, I flipped a coin, thinking “heads means I buy it, tails means I don’t.
